description: Quarterly Priority Review - Update Your Focus

backFields.label: üéØ Time to Review Your Priorities!
backFields.value:
Every quarter, you have the opportunity to review and update your three impact priorities based on community needs, your personal interests, or new opportunities.

Your Current Priorities:

2. ‚ö° Green Energy & Climate

backFields.label: Why Update Your Priorities?
backFields.value:
Reasons to adjust your priority mix:

‚úì Respond to emerging community needs
‚úì Support time-sensitive opportunities
‚úì Shift focus based on personal interests
‚úì Rebalance based on progress/completion
‚úì Align with new strategic initiatives
‚úì Support underserved priority areas

You can keep all 3 current priorities or change up to 3!

No penalties or fees for updates during quarterly review periods.
